description.narrative:
Objective
The main aims are:
To become a sustainable social enterprise by providing employment opportunities to women from marginalized groups and free services for vulnerable groups – especially beneficiaries of Caritas Šabac home care service; Providing premium quality services to local comunity for affortable price; Using environmentally friendly detergent/machines; Promoting social innovation answering in new way to the needs of vulnerable groups. Expected results
Sustainability of the project is achieved by paying of the services of dry cleaning, washing, drying and ironing of clothes and also delivery of the laundry to the clients. The laundry services are located in wider center of the city of Šabac. Sustainability is achivied. A new income from laundry service are reinvested in new social projects.
Main activities
Adaptation of the laundry room
Contracting new personnel
Selection of new potential clients and contact with them
Stakeholders animation – round table in promotion of social economy in Šabac
Results achieved
Caritas Šabac successfully finished process of purchase of premises for new laundry service
New service is equiped with necesary material and machines
New employees are selected from vulnerable groups and contracted
Laundry service is working well and it is sustainable
